APIError.description: An APIError communicates both general and field-specific errors. General errors include issues with core API usage as well as conflicts that involve more than one field. Field-specific errors correspond to an individual query parameter or request body attribute. Errors referencing nested fields will be dot-delimited (e.g. user.groups.0.name).

activate.description: If present, RFC 3986 URI indicating where an authenticated user may trigger activation of this Asset via a POST request. A 202 response indicates the activation request has been accepted. A 204 response indicates the Asset is already active. After successful activation, this Asset will have a non-empty location.

type.description: The RFC 3986 URI describing the AssetType

expires_at.description: If present, RFC 3339 timestamp indicating when this Asset will become inactive and will require reactivation.

location.description: If present, RFC 3986 URI that indicates a location that will yield image data. Consult the documentation of the Asset type to understand how to use this URI.

status.description: Current status of the Asset. "inactive" indicates that the Asset is not currently available for download, but may be after activation. "activating" indicates the Asset is currently undergoing activation, and may be available for download shortly. "active" indicates the Asset has been activated, and may currently be available for download if the authentication context permits.

AssetMap.description: An object mapping asset names to Asset objects

example.display_description: Non-radiometrically-calibrated analytic image stored as 12-bit digital numbers

md5_digest.description: md5 digest of asset type used to determine if the asset has changed

item_types.description: The ItemTypes to include in the search.

name.description: The name of this saved search.

item_types.description: The ItemTypes to include in the search.

name.description: The name of this saved search.

interval.description: This describes the size of the histogram date buckets.

utc_offset.description: A "ISO 8601 UTC offset" (e.g. +01:00 or -08:00) that can be used to adjust the buckets to a users time zone. It is optional.

_first.description: RFC 3986 URI representing the location of the first page of results.

_next.description: RFC 3986 URI representing the location of the next page of results. Omitted when there are no results, or the current page is the last.

GeoJSONGeometry.description: One geometry as defined by GeoJSON

assets.description: RFC 3986 URI representing the canonical location of the Assets subcollection.

example.display_description: 4-band PlanetScope imagery that is framed as captured.

LinearRing.description: An array of four positions where the first equals the last

_first.description: RFC 3986 URI representing the location of the first page of results.

_next.description: RFC 3986 URI representing the location of the next page of results. Omitted when there are no results, or the current page is the last.

_prev.description: RFC 3986 URI representing the location of the previous page of results. Omitted from first page of results.

PositionArray.description: An array of two or more positions

name.description: The name of this saved search.

_self.description: RFC 3986 URI representing the canonical location of this object.

count.description: Count of items in the bucket.

start_time.description: Start time of the bucket aggregated.

interval.description: This describes the size of the histogram date buckets.

utc_offset.description: A "ISO 8601 UTC offset" (e.g. +01:00 or -08:00) that can be used to adjust the buckets to a users time zone. It is optional.

info.description: The Planet Data API serves all Planet Labs imagery to public clients. This is the general spec that governs the common API objects and operations.
info.title: Planet Data API

qPage.description: Token representing a specific page of results. This should never be constructed manually.
qPage.name: _page

qPageSize.description: Return at most this number of results. This may only be used at the start of pagination. This may not be provided along side the "_page" parameter.
qPageSize.name: _page_size

qSearchResultSort.description: Order the results by the provided field, in a specific direction. This may not be provided alongside the "_page" parameter.
qSearchResultSort.name: _sort

qSearchSort.description: Order the results by the provided field, in a specific direction. This may not be provided alongside the "_page" parameter.
qSearchSort.name: _sort

qStrict.description: Set strict=True to filter out geometry that does not intersect with aoi
qStrict.name: strict

get.description: Lists all the AssetTypes available to the authenticated user.
Fetch a specific AssetType identified by AssetTypeID.

404.description: The requested AssetTypeID does not exist.

general.message: The requested asset type does not exist

get.description: Lists all the ItemTypes available to the authenticated user.
Fetch a specific ItemType identified by ItemTypeID.

404.description: The requested ItemTypeID does not exist.

general.message: The requested item type does not exist.

get.description: Fetch a specific Item for a given ItemType.

404.description: The specified Item does not exist, does not exist for the given ItemType, or the ItemType requested does not exist.

general.message: Could not find the requested item.

get.description: List all available Assets belonging to an Item identified by ItemID and ItemTypeID.

404.description: The specified ItemID or CatalogID do not exist.

general.message: Could not find the requested item.

post.description: Executes a structured search immediately without having to first save it.

parameters.description: The structured search to execute. We automatically generate a name and identifier for this search and redirect to its results. Quick searches may be cleaned periodically.
parameters.name: search

400.description: There was an error executing the search or with your search syntax.

filter.config.1.type.message: NotARealFilterType is not a valid type for discriminator

get.description: List saved searches available to the current user.

200.description: A paginated listing of your available searches.

Location.description: A URL for the newly created saved search.

400.description: There was an error creating your saved search.

404.description: The specified SearchID does not exist.

general.message: The requested search id does not exist

404.description: The specified SearchID does not exist.

general.message: The requested search id does not exist

400.description: There was an error updating the chosen saved search.

get.description: Executes a saved search and returns results.

404.description: The requested search id does not exist

general: The requested search id does not exist

post.description: Gives an aggregated count for the search filters given in an interval.

parameters.description: The structured search to execute with an interval and optional utc offset.
parameters.name: stats

200.description: List of stats aggregated over the interval given.

400.description: There was an error executing the stats or with your stats syntax.
